title: Research in Applying Frameworks-AIM
description: How exactly Cardano can enter into global partnerships must be better understood. Without data decision making is difficult/near impossible.
solution: Research how specifically UN Sustainable Development Goals & other frameworks applied in Project Catalyst can enhance impact and value.
experience: AIM members are the team behind the voter-tool, CA-tool, vCA-Tool. Educators, developers, designers and data experts.
